channel.title: Announcement on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on REDtalks.live

item.title: #071 - Announcing REDtalks Labs
item.description: Today, REDtalks.live turned 5 years old. It has been an amazing journey and I’ve been very grateful for the interactions with our fantastic listeners along the way. To mark the milestone I am delighted to be announcing the REDtalks Labs is now Open Source!
